bioconda.name: crispresso2
bioconda.summary: A software pipeline designed to enable rapid and intuitive interpretation of genome editing experiments.

biocontainers.name: crispresso2
biocontainers.summary: A software pipeline designed to enable rapid and intuitive interpretation of genome editing experiments

biotools.summary: Analysis of deep sequencing data for rapid and intuitive interpretation of genome editing experiments. CRISPResso2 can be used to analyze genome editing outcomes using cleaving nucleases (e.g. Cas9 or Cpf1) or noncleaving nucleases (e.g. base editors).

bioschemas.name: CRISPResso2
bioschemas.summary: Analysis of deep sequencing data for rapid and intuitive interpretation of genome editing experiments. CRISPResso2 can be used to analyze genome editing outcomes using cleaving nucleases (e.g. Cas9 or Cpf1) or noncleaving nucleases (e.g. base editors).
